roleset.name: to dominate, make insignificant by comparison

example.name: passive
example.text: One was that , despite his 62 regular-season wins over the past three seasons in the Land Beyond the Late News , he has been overshadowed [*] by his more-muscular mates and missed out on prizes that []might have been his due .

example.name: transitive
example.text: The Japanese assault on the luxury market is rapidly overshadowing such European makes as Audi and Saab , which [] at least have clear brand images .
example.arg: The Japanese assault on the luxury market
European makes as Audi and Saab , which [] at least have clear brand images

roleset.note: OVERSHADOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overshadow' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from overshadow.01-v predicate notes)
